definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
"eel worm", a parasitic worm carrying meningitis

sentences.english: The researchers were trying to understand the underpinnings of sexual attraction in the male nematodes.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员希望发现雄性线虫性吸引力的来源。

sentences.english: So the gene made the worms prefer germ-free locales.
sentences.chinese: 所以，这种基因使这些线虫选择没有细菌的环境。

sentences.english: Soybean cyst nematode is one of the most serious diseases in the world soybean areas.
sentences.chinese: 大豆胞囊线虫病是世界大豆产区危害最重的病害之一。

sentences.english: Nematodes , particularly in sandy soils, attack roots, forming galls and stunting the trees.
sentences.chinese: 线虫，特别是沙质土壤，攻击根，瘿的形成和发育树。

sentences.english: Objective To study the snails which transmit parasitic diseases of Angiostrongylus cantonensis in Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解云南省传播广州管圆线虫病的中间宿主螺类。

sentences.english: Body surface of pine wood nematode is covered with a layer of viscous polysaccharose.
sentences.chinese: 松材线虫体表具有一层粘液状多糖物质。

sentences.english: Hymenocera elegans here is found in the waters off of Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 它们是在印尼附近的海域里发现的鳕鱼的线虫。

sentences.english: The effect of high-voltage pulse current on the vitality and reproduction of pine wood nematode was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究高压脉冲电流对松材线虫活力和繁殖的影响。

sentences.english: This study confirmed the presence of immunological cross-reaction among these common nematodes.
sentences.chinese: 本研究表明，在某些线虫之间的确存在免疫交叉反应。

sentences.english: Comparison of making sample methods for quarantine of pine wood nematode in import wood packing.
sentences.chinese: 进境木包装松材线虫检验检疫制样方法比较。

sentences.english: The soil fumigation can increase the richness and evenness of nematode community.
sentences.chinese: 各消毒处理能提高线虫群落丰富度和均匀度。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the migratory route of Toxocara canis larvae in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察犬弓首线虫幼虫在小鼠体内的移行情况。

sentences.english: Research on fresh water and marine nematodes is also considered.
sentences.chinese: 同时也刊载有关淡水和海洋中线虫的研究。

sentences.english: In this paper, the distribution and damage level of root-knot disease of medicinal plants in China were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 对我国药用植物根结线虫病的分布和危害进行概述。

sentences.english: Research method is using three deep-sequencing data sets of C. elegans, G. gallusHomo sapiens.
sentences.chinese: 研究方法是选取了线虫，鸡和人的三套深度测序数据。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of metal exposure on defecation behavior in nematode Caenorhabditis elegans.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究重金属暴露对秀丽线虫排泄行为的影响。

definition: imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
trematoda/fluke/trematode worm, approx 6000 species, mostly parasite, incl. on humans
